Name: Lost Beyond
About the game: About the game Lost Beyond is a short Adventure Exploration game, where you play as a hiker whose entire reality is about to shift. A harmless trip to Canyons is about to unveil great mysteries, after you get trapped in underground caves. While trying to find a way out, you find a way in. A portal which takes you to alternate dimension, where reality is not like we know it. Find your way through a mysterious environment, piece together the clues that can lead you where you truly want to be, and try to hold it together while the Universe tests your worthiness. But be aware, not everything is as it seems to be. Are you ready for an adventure of a lifetime? Features - Next-Gen graphics - Smooth Performance - Unique and relaxing gameplay - Nanite and Lumen technology - Multiple levels with unique atmospheric feel - Puzzles and clues
